Constructors

| Improve this Doc View Source

Election(String, Int64, List<Candidate>, DateTime, DateTime)

An election is the process of voting between, at least two, candidates, occuring in a given location, between two dates/times.

Declaration
public Election(string electionName, long votingArea, List<Candidate> candidates, DateTime startDate, DateTime endDate)
